description:
Danarama demonstrates how even the most basic belt can be used in dozens of ways to restrain your partner for effective and minimalist bondage or rough sex. Used alone or in combination with other belts, devices, and furniture, belts can also be used for a variety of creative and intense Domination/submission options. Discover the fast and effective uses of one of the most common items nearly everyone has on hand. Don't let your belt just go to waist!
1. Selecting and altering belts for bondage use
2. Hand and arm restraint (single and double column)
3. Ankle/thigh restraints
4. Rough sex applications
Photos include many step-by-step images for reference.
title: Belt Bondage for BDSM and Rough Sex
